name: France
short_description: France is famous for Paris, world-class cuisine, wine regions, and iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower.

name: Italy
short_description: Italy offers ancient history, Renaissance art, stunning coastlines, and legendary cuisine.

name: Spain
short_description: Spain is known for vibrant cities, Mediterranean beaches, flamenco culture, and rich history.

name: United States
short_description: The USA offers diverse landscapes, iconic cities, national parks, and cultural landmarks.

name: Japan
short_description: Japan blends ancient traditions with futuristic cities, cherry blossoms, and unique cuisine.

name: Thailand
short_description: Thailand is famous for tropical beaches, temples, vibrant nightlife, and street food.

name: United Kingdom
short_description: The UK offers historic cities, royal heritage, countryside landscapes, and world-class museums.

name: Germany
short_description: Germany combines medieval towns, modern cities, castles, and scenic landscapes.

name: Greece
short_description: Greece is known for ancient ruins, idyllic islands, Mediterranean cuisine, and blue waters.

name: Australia
short_description: Australia offers stunning beaches, unique wildlife, vibrant cities, and natural wonders.

name: Canada
short_description: Canada is famous for vast wilderness, mountains, lakes, and multicultural cities.

name: Turkey
short_description: Turkey blends European and Asian cultures with rich history and beautiful coastlines.

name: United Arab Emirates
short_description: The UAE is known for futuristic architecture, luxury shopping, and desert experiences.

name: Portugal
short_description: Portugal offers scenic coastlines, historic cities, and world-renowned wine regions.

name: Mexico
short_description: Mexico is famous for ancient ruins, beaches, vibrant culture, and flavorful cuisine.

name: Indonesia
short_description: Indonesia offers tropical islands, volcanoes, and rich cultural traditions.

name: Brazil
short_description: Brazil is known for Rio de Janeiro, the Amazon rainforest, and vibrant festivals.

name: Switzerland
short_description: Switzerland offers alpine scenery, lakes, luxury travel, and picturesque villages.

name: Netherlands
short_description: The Netherlands is known for canals, cycling culture, tulip fields, and historic towns.

name: Egypt
short_description: Egypt attracts visitors with ancient pyramids, the Nile River, and rich archaeological history.
